meanings.definition: The action or process of innovating.
meanings.sent1: Her constant innovation in the kitchen led to delicious new recipes.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was driven by their culture of innovation.
meanings.sent3: The robot's attempt at innovation by wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Innovation is like a spark that ignites progress in all areas of life.
meanings.sent5: The innovation of the wheel revolutionized transportation forever.

meanings.definition: A new method, idea, product, etc.
meanings.sent1: The smartphone was an incredible innovation that changed how we communicate.
meanings.sent2: Every year, the tech industry showcases the latest innovations at the expo.
meanings.sent3: The cat's innovative way of opening doors surprised its owners.
meanings.sent4: Her dress design was an innovation that turned heads at the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: The innovation of solar panels has transformed the way we harness energy.
